titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller (Nelson A.) personal papers, Films, Series R
A Guide to the Nelson A. Rockefeller personal papers, Films, Series R FA755

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2015-09-19 07:10:00 -0400.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller personal papers, Films, Series R

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view films -- please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1902).
If the item does not have a designated AV number, please refer to the Title and the Film Number (which consists of a combination of Roman numerals and alphanumerics - example: III 14.1-6).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: All inquires to view films require advanced notice of at least 24 hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those that are not available in modern formats, may be restricted from scholarly access at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The contents of these NAR Films have been separated from other archival holdings among the NAR papers, as such the description of any individual item, or set of items, may also currently appear, in some form, in the finding aid for the originating collection.
Future processing, description, and presentation of Films will seek to address this issue as much as feasible.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A group of amateur and professional films, television episodes, etc., belonging to or featuring NAR.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Films relating to NARâ€™s political career are described in FA756.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller: Dartmouth Reunion I

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: All inquires to view films require advanced notice of at least 24 hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those not available in modern formats, may be restricted from scholarly access at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: 1935 footage from Class of 1930 reunion in Hanover VT: classmates join baseball game on campus, marching band, picnic on the Haffenraffer Estate, etc.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller: Dartmouth Reunion II

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: All inquires to view films require advanced notice of at least 24 hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those not available in modern formats, may be restricted from scholarly access at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Hanover, VT: Senior class officers, Alpha Delta Phi fraternity baseball game, Beth Theta Pi group in front of house, Psi Upsilon baseball game, Sigma Alpha Epsilon play cards; views of Dartmouth campus; hazing scene with men dressed liked babies in competition for "cutest baby".

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller Family Film II

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: All inquires to view films require advanced notice of at least 24 hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those not available in modern formats, may be restricted from scholarly access at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: 1940s footage of Nelson Rockefeller family on vacations: Yellowstone Park WY at Old Faithful, at Jackson Lake Lodge, riding horses; playing at Seal Harbor, twins on the beach; Pocantico Hills-Hawes House, visiting with JDR JR and Abby, sailing boats.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: All inquires to view films require advanced notice of at least 24 hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those not available in modern formats, may be restricted from scholarly access at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: 1950 footage of the family playing at Pocantico Hills with JDR JR: playing in pool, eating on patio; additional footage from the graduation of Steven Rockefeller from Princeton University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: All inquires to view films require advanced notice of at least 24 hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those not available in modern formats, may be restricted from scholarly access at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1930s and 1940s travel footage from Asia and the western United States. Nelson A. Rockefeller and Mary Toddhunter Clark Rockefeller in the Far East. Footage includes scenes of Chinese boat and rice paddies. Footage of Pocantico Hills with scenes of Mary Toddhunter Clark Rockefeller playing with the children in the garden, miscellenous footage of the western United States, and scenes of Mary Toddhunter Clark Rockefeller and children playing in Seal Harbor at the beach.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: All inquires to view films require advanced notice of at least 24 hours, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those not available in modern formats, may be restricted from scholarly access at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Ronald Reagan address to the California Bar Association, at the Disneyland Hotel.
